title: CAPA - Crystallization Process Control Improvement - Paracetamol
description: Install programmable temperature control system with redundant cooling circuits. Establish controlled cooling rate protocols and implement real-time crystal quality monitoring.

title: CAPA - Pump Reliability Enhancement Program - Ibuprofen
description: Upgrade pump sealing systems with chemically resistant materials. Implement pump performance monitoring and establish backup pump availability for critical operations.

title: CAPA - Valve Control System Enhancement - Atorvastatin Calcium
description: Upgrade valve actuators with digital position feedback systems. Implement valve performance verification procedures and establish backup manual operation capabilities for critical valves.

title: CAPA - Pump Reliability Enhancement Program - Metformin HCl
description: Upgrade pump sealing systems with chemically resistant materials. Implement pump performance monitoring and establish backup pump availability for critical operations.

title: CAPA - Material Identification System Upgrade - Amlodipine Besylate
description: Implement barcode/RFID tracking system for all incoming materials. Establish dual identity verification procedures and supplier labeling requirements enhancement.

title: CAPA - Material Identification System Upgrade - Sofosbuvir
description: Implement barcode/RFID tracking system for all incoming materials. Establish dual identity verification procedures and supplier labeling requirements enhancement.
